meanings.definition: To be inherent or innate in something.
meanings.sent1: The beauty of the painting inheres in its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: Kindness inheres in her nature, making her a beloved friend.
meanings.sent3: The magic of the story inheres in the unexpected plot twist.
meanings.sent4: Hope inheres in the darkest of times, like a flickering candle in a storm.
meanings.sent5: Courage inheres in the heart of the hero, driving them to face any challenge.

meanings.definition: To be an essential characteristic of something.
meanings.sent1: The responsibility of a leader inheres in making tough decisions.
meanings.sent2: Honesty inheres in all successful relationships, building trust.
meanings.sent3: The humor of the comedian inheres in their witty jokes and funny expressions.
meanings.sent4: Confidence inheres in the champion, shining like a beacon of strength.
meanings.sent5: Wisdom inheres in the teachings of the elders, guiding the younger generation.
